newsitem.title: USA: MVSI Inc ends e-Net acquisition.
newsitem.headline: MVSI Inc ends e-Net acquisition.

text.p: MVSI Inc said Wednesday that it has decided against proceeding with its acquisition of e-Net, a development stage telecommunications products and services company in Washington, D.C.
It said the December 5 expulsion of MVSI's former underwriter, Stratton Oakmont Inc, from the securities industry hurt trading volume and depressed the price of its stock.
"As a result of this adverse and untimely development, MVSI and e-Net have agreed that it is not in the best interests of the shareholders of either company to proceed," MVSI said in a release.

The company said e-Net will now give it a five-year conversion option to acquire e-Net securities that MVSI could exercise instead of demanding cash repayment for a $1.25 million loan it made to e-Net.
